references.paper_title: Truncated variance reduction: A unified approach to Bayesian optimization and level-set estimation
references.reason: This paper provides a unified framework for Bayesian optimization and level-set estimation, which are both related to the active set ordering problem.

references.paper_title: A tutorial on Bayesian optimization of expensive cost functions, with application to active user modeling and hierarchical reinforcement learning
references.reason: This tutorial provides a comprehensive overview of Bayesian optimization, a key technique used in the active set ordering problem.
This review paper provides a background on Bayesian experimental design, which is fundamental to the active set ordering problem.
This tutorial provides a comprehensive overview of Bayesian optimization, a key technique related to the active set ordering problem.

references.paper_title: Gaussian process optimization in the bandit setting: No regret and experimental design
references.reason: This paper introduces the Gaussian process optimization in the bandit setting, a closely related problem to the active set ordering problem, providing a theoretical foundation for the proposed approach.
